en: Get the owner/moderators of current chatroom.
If you specify the chatroom it will show the owner/moderators of that room only if @BotName@ is connected to that room.
ro: Dacă specifici o cameră de chat, va afişa proprietarul/moderatorii camerei doar dacă @BotName@ e conectat la camera respectivă.

en: Get the banned words of current chatroom.
If you specify the chatroom it will show the banned words of that room only if @BotName@ is connected to that room.
ro: Afişează cuvintele interzise ale camerei curente.
Dacă specifici o cameră de chat, va afişa cuvintele interzise ale camerei doar dacă @BotName@ e conectat la camera respectivă.
